<center>![](https://i.imgur.com/7RVqdOr.png)</center>

How's it going, folks! Cyclone Servers has been in business since 2013. We take our hosting business seriously and only want to offer our customers the best services possible to do this we have been recently upgrading our hardware and networking equipment ready to offer the best we can.

Newly updated hardware in our Los Angeles and North Carolina location.

Test out our network with these IPs!

NETWORK INFORMATION:

Seattle WA:
Test IPv4:207.244.151.34

North Carolina:
Test IPv4: 192.198.92.170

Los Angeles:
Test IPv4: 69.12.86.162

Our Features:

- Instant Activation (Subject to fraud checks)
- One-click OS Install with ready templates - CentOS, Debian, Suse, Ubuntu and now Windows
- Custom ISO - Use our available Windows & FreeBSD or bring your own ISO.
- One-click CP Install - Available on our VPS Panel, cPanel, Plesk, Webuzo, Webmin, VestaCP and more!.
- Additional IPs - Add up to 4 IPs per VPS at only $2 /Month/VPS

We do have some promos:

Save 35% Off [Recurring] Using Promo Code: 35OFFFEB 

Expires:04/05/2019

<br>
Check out our KVM Offers.

KVM VPS (Now all SSD)

KVM 1GB | 25 GB + 1 TB Bandwidth | $4.87/mo

KVM 2GB | 35 GB + 2 TB Bandwidth | $5.52/mo

KVM 3GB | 45 GB + 3 TB Bandwidth | $6.17/mo

KVM 4GB | 55 GB + 4 TB Bandwidth | $6.82/mo

Check out the plans here: [Click Here](https://clients.cycloneservers.net/cart.php)

<br>
[Special]

At Cyclone, we will price match any competition price that is verifiable and valid on the competition's website or advertising.* *Subject to "within reasonable standards"


[Extras]

Now accepting CC. (Stripe) and BTC - We are willing to create custom plans or upgrade individual specifications (such as disk space) for an additional fee. - We own ALL our own hardware. With our Seattle server being a 64 core server!

DDOS Protection in all locations.

Please let us know if you have any questions. You can submit a ticket to reach a sales rep here: [Click Here to Contact Support/Sales](https://clients.cycloneservers.net/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=4)

Thank you!!
